description: The initiative focuses on developing a sustainable seaweed farming industry in Sri Lanka, aiming to uplift local communities, particularly women, by providing job opportunities and fair compensation. The project emphasizes innovation through research and development, creating value-added products like CMOS drinks and gummies. By collaborating with local farmers and universities, the initiative seeks to establish a vertically integrated supply chain, enhancing quality control and promoting environmental benefits, while addressing challenges in the agricultural sector.
name: Seashore Garden
